description:
Mom picks up Bunji from school on a rainy day, with an umbrella in her hand. She notices responsible little girls and rambunctious little boys, without umbrellas, running about...; Dad apologizes profusely after Mom says she`ll divorce him if all he ever does is drink. Bunji hears this and asks what "divorce" means. He finds out it`s something scarier than a ghost; Mom and the gang get dressed up and walk around the neighborhood for Halloween. But, they are chased by a dog and get lectures by Dad who has no idea what Halloween is.; At the kindergarten Halloween party, there are a group of young moms who are enthusiastic about it, a group who have no idea what it is, and a group of randomly crazy foreign moms...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Carry Umbrellas! / Shiritori / Halloween / Not a Good Fit
傘をさせ! / しりとり / ハロウィン / なじまず
